subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Raptors escaped with a 107-106 victory over the Nets on Wednesday night after Nets point guard Devin Harris missed an open 16-foot jumper at the buzzer.
snippet: The Raptors escaped with a 107-106 victory over the Nets on Wednesday night after Nets point guard Devin Harris missed an open 16-foot jumper at the buzzer.
